text: @JoeBiden It's full of bullshit pork that you Democrats put in there that is completely unrelated to the covid19 epidemic. I sure hope to hell it doesn't pass. Maybe ask the speaker of the house to get her shit together and get back to work on a bipartisan plan, not that 1,800 page wish
